summary: Both a visual flashback and a telling of the life and birth of the alter ego that was David Bowie's Ziggy Stardust.
cast: Jarvis Cocker|David Bowie|Marc Almond|Rodney Bingenheimer|Trevor Bolder|John Cambridge|Leee Black Childers|Cherie Currie|Peter Doggett|Mike Garson|Dana Gillespie|Steve Harley|Peter Hook|John 'Hutch' Hutchinson|Elton John|Holly Johnson|Dylan Jones|Gary Kemp|Lindsay Kemp|Mick Rock|Suzi Ronson|Jon Savage|Ken Scott|George Underwood|Cherry Vanilla|Mick Woodmansey|Lulu
title: David Bowie & the Story of Ziggy Stardust
